# RDM Testbench

This testbench is designed for RDM + Mapping + Buddy integration testing.
The packet format is described at `app/rdma/README.md`.

This RDM supports:
- Alloc
- Read
- Write

About `input.txt`:

Alloc packet with the opcode=3
```
16
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
1000000000000000 FF
0000000000100003 FF (last byte, opcode=3, alloc)
0000000000002000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
```

Read packet with the opcode=0
```
16
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
1000000000000000 FF
0000000000100000 FF (last byte, opcode=0, read)
0000000000010000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
0000000000000000 FF
```
